Count of duration types. Retention duration is obtained by the counting the duration type Count times.
For example, when Count = 3 and DurationType = Weeks, retention duration will be three weeks.

Workload compression flag. This has been added so that 'isSqlCompression'
will be deprecated once clients upgrade to consider this flag.

SnapshotBackupAdditionalDetails.description: Snapshot Backup related fields for WorkloadType SaPHanaSystem

SubProtectionPolicy.description: Sub-protection policy which includes schedule and retention

retentionPolicy.description: Retention policy with the details on backup copy retention ranges.

schedulePolicy.description: Backup schedule specified as part of backup policy.

snapshotBackupAdditionalDetails.description: Snapshot Backup related fields for WorkloadType SaPHanaSystem

tieringPolicy.description:
Tiering policy to automatically move RPs to another tier.
Key is Target Tier, defined in RecoveryPointTierType enum.
Tiering policy specifies the criteria to move RP to the target tier.

TieringPolicy.description:
Tiering Policy for a target tier.
If the policy is not specified for a given target tier, service retains the existing configured tiering policy for that tier

duration.description:
Number of days/weeks/months/years to retain backups in current tier before tiering.
Used only if TieringMode is set to TierAfter

durationType.description:
Retention duration type: days/weeks/months/years
Used only if TieringMode is set to TierAfter

tieringMode.description:
Tiering Mode to control automatic tiering of recovery points. Supported values are:
1. TierRecommended: Tier all recovery points recommended to be tiered
2. TierAfter: Tier all recovery points after a fixed period, as specified in duration + durationType below.
3. DoNotTier: Do not tier any recovery points

clientId.description: The client ID of the assigned identity.

principalId.description: The principal ID of the assigned identity.

identityArmId.description: The ARM id of the assigned identity.

identityName.description: The name of the assigned identity.

daysOfTheWeek.description: List of days of the week.
List of days of week for weekly retention policy.

scheduleRunTimes.description: List of times of day this schedule has to be run.

inquiryValidation.description: Inquiry validation such as permissions and other backup validations.

itemCount.description: Contains the protectable item Count inside this Container.

type.description: Type of the Workload such as SQL, Oracle etc.

monthsOfYear.description: List of months of year of yearly retention policy.

retentionScheduleDaily.description: Daily retention format for yearly retention policy.

retentionScheduleFormatType.description: Retention schedule format for yearly retention policy.

retentionScheduleWeekly.description: Weekly retention format for yearly retention policy.
